transcription: Find words you know. Find words you know.  and think about meaning. If you don't understand, hmm, think. There are many meanings for some words. For example, L-I-T-T-L-E, little. Little, little can mean little girl. Aw, she's walking. You could see a little bug. Little bug.  There are many meanings for the same word, like little, L-I-T-T-L-E.
